#8837 feat(algebra/add_torsor, linear_algebra/affine_space/affine_equiv, analysis/normed_space/affine_isometry): base_at construction
awaiting-review

@Oliver Nash @Yaël Dillies As far as I can tell this PR doesn't really conflict with ongoing refactors, right? Would you mind taking a look?

cc @Heather Macbeth as PR author
No indeed, that should be fine. I did already have a look but didn't quite understand what it was about. I'll try harder.
Ok, let's try to get this in!
